        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getOrFail

        public static <K,V> V getOrFail(Map<K,V> map,
                                K key)
        Get an element from the map (that can be null) or throw a NotFoundException if the element is not in the map.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type of map keys
        K - The type of map values
        Parameters:
        map - The map from which to get the element or null.
        key - The key of the element.
        Returns:
        A non null element.

      • getOrFail

        public static <K,V> V getOrFail(Map<K,V> map,
                                K key,
                                String message,
                                Object... args)
        Get an element from the map (that can be null) or throw a NotFoundException if the element is not in the map.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The type of map keys
        K - The type of map values
        Parameters:
        map - The map from which to get the element or null.
        key - The key of the element.
        message - The error message for the not found exception. The message supports same formatting as logs "This is message {}", "message".
        args - The arguments for the message formatting.
        Returns:
        A non null element.

        Parameters:

        key - The key for which to check unicity
        message - The message in case of error.

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • fill

        public static <T> T[] fill(T[] array,
                           Collection collection)
        Fill an array with data from an untyped collection. Both must have the same size.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of elements in the array (should be the same in collection)
        Parameters:
        array - The array in which to insert elements.
        collection - The untyped collection that contains elements to put in the array.
        Returns:
        The filled array.
